Text: My proposal would be funded by increasing taxes on the wealthy, as they have benefited most from the economic growth.
examples: What I have proposed would be paid for by raising taxes on the wealthy, because they have made all the gains in the economy.

examples: Again and again and again, the mother disappears in 3 days, and the child becomes a ward of the state because he's permanently and genetically damaged.

Text: Our healthcare system is admired globally because we prioritize having decisions made by doctors and patients rather than central government bureaucrats.
examples: Our health-care system is the envy of the world because we believe in making sure that the decisions are made by doctors and patients, not by officials in the nation's capital.
